tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  CARING  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: Doc is a great professor for public speaking. We had 4 speeches with very clear grading criteria. He tells us exactly what he expects from us in our speeches, offers a grading rubric, and gives great feedback. If you ask ahead of time, he is more than willing to help you prepare for a speech. I highly recommend him!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
stu_tags: AMAZING LECTURES  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  INSPIRATIONAL
comments: Doc does an excellent job at teaching this subject matter. His lectures are all power points that are helpful and he puts them online for your review. All of the blackboard access, homework, projects and tests are given to you with clear and concise detail. One word for his teaching and presentation: Class!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: I hate speech but "Doc" Frederick made success in this course possible. Not sure why but apparently he allows 8 absences ? He grades fairly and keeps you working hard... if you don\'t try you won\'t get a C. If you do, you\'ll at least get a B.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: This is how a public speaking class should be. He grades your speeches fairly and doesn\'t baby you about them. I.E if your speeches sucks, he will fail you. He gives two tests, which are completely bogus and most people fail them, but your speeches make up the vast majority of your grade. I can say that I definitely became a better speaker.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Mark Frederick is a nice guy. Overall, i would take his class again if i had to. His tests are ridiculous though. 3 tests - 100 questions each (on 6 chapter each?!) . Very confusing questions with long (full sentence) answers. When you do your speeches make sure you follow the structure and go by the outline and you will be fine. He is ok.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  GET READY TO READ
comments: If you do not have the access code for the book you will fail every test because he does not write his own test questions based on in class lectures. He pulls questions from a publishers site and most of them are not even discussed in class. Worst teacher so far.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I liked Doc Frederick, but his grading was a little ridiculous. He\'s harsh on speeches. My class was fun, but because of the people in it, not really the professor. Its a pretty boring class. And the test are so hard. And you have to pay $50 for the online tool to study for it. this class is tolerable, but id suggest a different prof if you can.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Doc is a good professor. The class can be a bit boring, but he tries to spice things up. Four speeches and three test. The tests are a bit ridiculous as you have to purchase an access code to take practice exams from the textbook. You can do bad on the test, and still do stellar if you nail all of your speeches!

comments: THIS CLASS WAS SO BORING !!! OTHER THAN THAT HE IS PRETTY FUNNY HE TRIES TO MAKE IT A FUN CLASS BUT IT WAS AN EPIC FAILURE . THE TEST ARE HARD ESPECIALLY SINCE YOU ARE REQUIRED TO PAY 50.00 FOR MY SPEECH LAB OVERALL 4 SPEECHES AND 3 TEST OTHER THAN THE TEST THE CLASS IS EASY BUT YOU CAN FAIL ALL THE TEST AND STILL PASS.

comments: He is such a great teacher!he answers all questions and is has an awesome personality. the powerpoint is the exact same thing as the textbook. 4 tests and 4 speeches.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Highly reccomend. Great professor. 4 speeches, 4 tests. You can easily study for his tests by taking practice tests through the books website. Attendance is mandatory. Seriously practice your speeches and you will do fine. Only way to fail is if you don\'t apply yourself.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Found Doc to be very helpful and informative. Took notes from power ponts, but found that by simply reading the material from the book and knowing the vacabulary helped out tremendously on his tests.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Doc is a good teacher. His lectures are slide shows of information from the textbook. Easy pass! just take notes during lectures and know the vocab words from the textbook for the tests. Put some effort into your speeches...IT COUNTS and SHOWS! Grades fair, funny guy, helpful and approachable...dont miss class though! Overall...take him.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: This is my first class I\'m taking at TCC, I\'m very impressed! I like the way he teaches and grades are fair. Tests are easy, 4 speeches, he doesn\'t videotape the speeches anymore. Fun and easy overall.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Doc Frederick\'s class was very easy and kind of fun. The organization of the course is great. He does read off of slides as his lectures, which are from the book so you don\'t really need the book if you take notes. He\'s a cool guy, I\'d recommend him.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: For starters Doc is NOT HOT and not a good teacher. I had to take some time off for a family members funeral and he refused to comp the absences I was gone even though I had proof where I was. Also he would give me the wrong grade and I would have to go back and have him change it. I think he was just rude the entire semester and annoying.

comments: Doc Frederick is an outstanding prof. pproachable and helpful. Don\'t miss class an make sure you\'ve read over the chapters for the test.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Doc Frederick is a great teacher. I was so scared to take a Speech class until I got into his class. I did horribly speaking in High School and Im averaging A-B in his class. Make sure you know your vocabulary because his tests really test that and other misc. things from the textbook.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Doctor Frederick is an okay teacher. He teaches straight from powerpoints which can be boring at times. Honestly just do well on the tests (go on the book\'s website and do the practice tests) and follow all the guidelines for the speeches and you should do fine.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: "Doc" Frederick is very full of himself. The teachers addition of the book comes with a powerpoint for each chapter which he uses for the duration of the class. I can teach from a powerpoint and make it more interesting and I don\'t have a PhD. WILL BORE YOU TO TEARS. But hey I got a B so why am I complaining?
